name: One Punch Square
description:
The circles have come to invade and pillage Squaresville.

Only one square can save us, and that square goes by One Punch Square

Smite the evil circles with just one punch.

Controls:

     Mouse to move

     Space or Left mouse button to punch

Assets:

MusicAntti LuodeFontDaniel Linssen

Made for Mini Jam 12 - 'Heros' 

     Restriction: Using only basic shapes
